note.para: You will need an IPv6-aware operating system, like Linux 2.4.21 with the ipv6 module loaded or Windows XP Service Pack 1. Please look at the features pages on the VideoLAN web site to know about the status of IPv6 in VLC and VLS for each O.S.

warning.para: If you are using VMware under Linux, you will have to stop VMware and unload the VMware kernel modules, because we noticed it prevented IPv6 streaming !
